title: Ravi Shastri's Second Doppelganger Has Been Spotted And Fans Have Come Up With Some Hilarious Memes
text:
Ravi Shastri's Second Doppelganger Has Been Spotted And Fans Have Come Up With Some Hilarious Memes

Ravi Shastri's Second Doppelganger Has Been Spotted And Fans Have Come Up With Some Hilarious Memes

To be brutally honest, it is not a good time to be Ravi Shastri. Mind you, his wards are playing well and it is not his coaching that is the reason. Fans just like to troll him regardless, be it of him falling asleep during a game, making aggressive statements or appearing sloshed. What's worse the man in charge of BCCI right now is Sourav Ganguly and there is no love lost between them.

Cricinfo/Twitter

Well another reason to go after him has been when they have spotted his doppekganger. The first lookalike was spotted in a Mumbai local and people really had a gala time with that. Check it out:

When BCCI refuse to pay your travel allowances pic.twitter.com/MdgZl71925 — D J 🎧 (@djaywalebabu) November 4, 2018

Now, his second doppelganger has been spotted. An Indian fan was seen looking very much like Shastri while watching the Ranchi Test vs South Africa. The resemblance was so much that it caught the attention of fans. What did they do? They got creative. Some hilarious memes came into play and well, that pretty much flooded the internet. Here we go:

Don't Miss 1.6 K SHARES 6 K SHARES 750 SHARES 322 SHARES

Ravi shastri - Bhaad me gaya pitch (kyun ki yaha to bas full toss hi daalte hain.) pic.twitter.com/Ux2V1gPJdJ — Happy (@FakeRainaNephew) October 28, 2019

If Ravi Shastri and Pablo Escobar had a child. — KushagraSpeaks (@kushagra1) October 28, 2019

Ravi Bhai How is life??

Ravi Shastri:

1. Before Ganguly

2. After Ganguly pic.twitter.com/C9ySul8rPg — The Daddy™ (@TheDaddee) October 28, 2019

Shastri himself of course had nothing to do with this, but it seems anything about him or related to him becomes the target for jokes when it comes to cricket followers.
